Body:
Description: Hi Team,

Liebherr Group Turkey team reached out to me mentioning that they are not able to use OTP with EPP client 6.2.4.1006.

Please let us know in case additional details are needed to address this behavior.

Thank you,

Oana Nemes | Team Lead, Customer Success
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

Steps to Reproduce Updated: 1. Generate OTP
2. Apply OTP to the Epp client. OTP seen as invalid.

What We've Learned Updated: Issue is present in 6.2.4.1006.
Isuse resolved in 6.2.4.2000

Next Steps Updated: 6.2.4.2000 is imported on the customer's Epp sever.
He will update the Epp client going forward
